verses.verse: And you <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, take <S%H3947><s%> a sharp <S%H2299><s%> knife <S%H2719><s%>, take <S%H3947><s%> a barber <S%H1532><s%>'s razor <S%H8593><s%>, and cause it to pass <S%H5674><s%> upon your head <S%H7218><s%> and upon your beard <S%H2206><s%>: then take <S%H3947><s%> balances <S%H3976><s%> to weigh <S%H4948><s%>, and divide the hair <S%H2505><s%>.

You shall burn <S%H1197><s%> with fire <S%H217><s%> a third part <S%H7992><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, when the days <S%H3117><s%> of the siege <S%H4692><s%> are fulfilled <S%H4390><s%>: and you shall take <S%H3947><s%> a third part <S%H7992><s%>, and strike <S%H5221><s%> about <S%H5439><s%> it with a knife <S%H2719><s%>: and a third part <S%H7992><s%> you shall scatter <S%H2219><s%> in the wind <S%H7307><s%>; and I will draw out <S%H7324><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> after them <S%H310><s%>.
You shall also take <S%H3947><s%> there a few <S%H4592><s%> in number <S%H4557><s%>, and bind <S%H6696><s%> them in your skirts <S%H3671><s%>.

Then take of them again <S%H3947><s%>, and cast <S%H7993><s%> them into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>, and burn <S%H8313><s%> them in the fire <S%H784><s%>; for there shall a fire <S%H784><s%> come forth <S%H3318><s%> into all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; This is Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: I have set <S%H7760><s%> it in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> and countries <S%H776><s%> that are round about her <S%H5439><s%>.

And she has changed <S%H4784><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%> into wickedness <S%H7564><s%> more than the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and my statutes <S%H2708><s%> more than the countries <S%H776><s%> that are round about <S%H5439><s%> her <S%H3988><s%>: for they have refused my judgments <S%H4941><s%> and my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, they have not walked in them <S%H1980><s%>.

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; Because you multiplied <S%H1995><s%> more than the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are round about <S%H5439><s%> you <S%H1980><s%>, and have not walked in my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, neither have kept <S%H6213><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, neither have done <S%H6213><s%> according to the judgments <S%H4941><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are round about you <S%H5439><s%>;

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; Behold <S%H6213><s%>, I, even I, am against you, and will execute judgments <S%H4941><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>.
And I will do <S%H6213><s%> in you that which I have not done <S%H6213><s%>, and unto what I will not do <S%H6213><s%> any more the like <S%H3282><s%>, because of all your abominations <S%H8441><s%>.

Therefore the fathers <S%H1><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you <S%H1121><s%>, and the sons shall eat <S%H398><s%> their fathers <S%H1><s%>; and I will execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> in you <S%H7611><s%>, and the whole remnant of you will I scatter <S%H2219><s%> into all the winds <S%H7307><s%>.

Therefore <S%H2416><s%>, as I live, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; Surely <S%H2930><s%>, because you have defiled my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> with all your detestable things <S%H8251><s%>, and with all your abominations <S%H8441><s%>, therefore will I also diminish <S%H1639><s%> you <S%H5869><s%>; neither shall my eye spare <S%H2347><s%>, neither will I have any pity <S%H2550><s%>.

A third part <S%H7992><s%> of you shall die <S%H4191><s%> with the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>, and with famine <S%H7458><s%> shall they be consumed <S%H3615><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you <S%H7992><s%>: and a third part shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> you <S%H2219><s%>; and I will scatter a third part <S%H7992><s%> into all the winds <S%H7307><s%>, and I will draw out <S%H7324><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> after them <S%H310><s%>.

Thus shall my anger <S%H639><s%> be accomplished <S%H3615><s%>, and I will cause my fury <S%H2534><s%> to rest <S%H5117><s%> upon them <S%H5162><s%>, and I will be comforted: and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I the Lord <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it in my zeal <S%H7068><s%>, when I have accomplished <S%H3615><s%> my fury in them <S%H2534><s%>.

Moreover I will make <S%H5414><s%> you waste <S%H2723><s%>, and a reproach <S%H2781><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are round about <S%H5439><s%> you <S%H5869><s%>, in the sight of all that pass by <S%H5674><s%>.

So it shall be a reproach <S%H2781><s%> and a taunt <S%H1422><s%>, a instruction <S%H4148><s%> and a astonishment <S%H4923><s%> unto the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are round about <S%H5439><s%> you <S%H6213><s%>, when I shall execute judgments <S%H8201><s%> in you in anger <S%H639><s%> and in fury <S%H2534><s%> and in furious <S%H2534><s%> rebukes <S%H8433><s%>. I the Lord <S%H3068><s%> have spoken it <S%H1696><s%>.

When I shall send <S%H7971><s%> upon them the evil <S%H7451><s%> arrows <S%H2671><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%>, which shall be for their destruction <S%H4889><s%>, and which I will send <S%H7971><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> you <S%H3254><s%>: and I will increase the famine <S%H7458><s%> upon you <S%H7665><s%>, and will break your staff <S%H4294><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>:

So will I send <S%H7971><s%> upon you famine <S%H7458><s%> and evil <S%H7451><s%> animals <S%H2416><s%>, and they shall bereave <S%H7921><s%> you <S%H1698><s%>; and pestilence and blood <S%H1818><s%> shall pass through <S%H5674><s%> you <S%H935><s%>; and I will bring the sword <S%H2719><s%> upon you <S%H3068><s%>. I the Lord have spoken it <S%H1696><s%>.
